NoHitDist.Wiki: Collision points above this distance [m] are judged as No Hit (less than 0: invalid)

isCollectNoHitPoint.AltName: Include Collision Point of No Hit
isCollectNoHitPoint.Wiki: Do you include NoHit collision points?

isCollectOutdoorPoint.Wiki: Do you include outdoor collision points?

isCollectFloorPoint.Wiki: Do you include floor collision points?

distValCalcType.Wiki: Evaluation distance calculation type (0: normal, average from 1: Max)

enableLifeTime.Wiki: Collision points longer than this life [second] are treated as invalid. Set to be less than or equal to the life of the common setting

maxDistRecordNum.Wiki: Max Number of collision point records

ignoreDistNumForMax.Wiki: Max distance decimation number (0: not decimation) (must be set to the value of Max collision point record number-1. Incorrect value will be corrected)
